content.rendered:
Sharing green building news and views

CAGBC is fortunate to work with a number of media outlets committed to green building. Like us, they support Canada’s building and design community and give voice to sustainability champions. We thank them for their contributions and ongoing support.

Sustainable Architecture & Building Magazine (SABMag)

CAGBC’s longest-standing media partner, Sustainable Architecture & Building Magazine (SABMag) covers sustainable, high-performance commercial, institutional and industrial building design. SABMag includes building profiles, design-practice and education articles, industry news and product announcements, and interviews with experts in the field.

SABMag partners with CAGBC in the production of LEED Buildings Year-in-Review, a complete list of all certified projects, including profiles of sample buildings projects. To get your certified project included, email the publisher. SABMag also publishes regional FOCUS publications with CAGBC, covering local building projects, programs and news. They are distributed in print and digital formats, and available here.

SABMag and sister publication ecoHouse Canada are published by Janam Media & Marketing Communications.

REMI Network

The REMI Network is an award-winning news and information source serving the real estate management industry.

Our editorial mandate is to provide meaningful content for professionals involved in every stage of real estate management – from the planning of a project all the way through to a property’s development (design and construction) and its occupancy, management and maintenance. The REMI Network covers industry news, tackles prominent and emerging topics of interest to real estate management professionals, and provides practical advice from a wide variety of industry experts.

Owned and operated by MediaEdge Communications Inc., the REMI Network also serves as a gateway to seven industry-leading publications: (1) Canadian Property Management, (2) Canadian Apartment Magazine, (3) CondoBusiness, (4) Canadian Facility Management & Design, (5) Facility Cleaning & Maintenance, (6) Construction Business and (7) Design Quarterly.

ConstructConnect

Backed by industry-recognized brands, the Daily Commercial News and Journal of Commerce, ConstructConnect answers the demand for insight that helps construction professionals discover new opportunities, connect with the market, compete effectively and drive profitable business results.

ConstructConnect is the premier construction information provider, delivering actionable insight into market activity within Canada and the United States via targeted, precise and timely project information, cost data, market intelligence and marketing solutions.

Find out more about their publications and work by visiting constructconnect.com.

RENX.ca and Sustainable Biz Canada

The Real Estate News Exchange (RENX) is the premier online news service for the Canadian commercial real estate industry providing articles, columns, breaking news and commentary about the built environment.

Sustainable Biz Canada is a news service affiliated with RENX which serves Canadian business professionals in the corporate sustainability sector. It currently specializes in the built environment and is broadening its coverage to include corporate environmental, social, and governance-related news.

AZURE Magazine

AZURE is an award-winning magazine with a focus on contemporary architecture and design. Since its launch in 1985, it has earned a global reputation for excellence. Its international perspective and multidisciplinary coverage – which puts architecture, interiors, products, landscapes and urbanism together in a real-world scenario – make it distinct from any other publication available on newsstands.

In eight visually stunning issues per year, AZURE explores inventive projects, emerging trends and design issues that relate to our changing society. Innovative, forward-looking and socially relevant is how we like to describe the projects and ideas we feature. Entertaining, informative and unabashedly beautiful are the words our readers use to describe AZURE.

Have a look and see for yourself at their website.
